com.reactivecascade.i

Interface IBindingContext<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object which will control the opening and closing of this binding context
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAspect
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BindingContextUtil.DefaultBindingContext

    public interface IBindingContext<T>
    A lifecycle for a reactive or functional relationship

    The lifecycle starts as connected and may disconnect atomically after which point more results will not start. Within any single thread, no new results will be returned after unbinding

    • Method Summary
